attributes.documentation: @title ERC20 interface is a subset of the ERC20 specification.
attributes.name: ERC20

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation:
@title Ownable has an owner address and provides basic authorization control functions.
 This contract is modified version of the MIT OpenZepplin Ownable contract 
 This contract doesn't allow for multiple changeOwner operations
 https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Constructor sets the original owner of the contract and whether or not it is one time transferable.
@dev Reverts if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
transferOwnership

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "owner cannot be set to zero address"

attributes.type: literal_string "owner cannot be set to zero address"
attributes.value: owner cannot be set to zero address

attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation: @return the address of the owner.
attributes.name: owner

attributes.documentation: @return true if the ownership is transferable.
attributes.name: isTransferable

attributes.documentation: @return true if sender is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: _isOwner

attributes.documentation: @title ILicence interface describes methods for loading a TokenCard inclusive of licence fees.
attributes.name: ILicence

attributes.documentation: @title Licence loads the TokenCard and transfers the licence fee to the token holder contract.
attributes.name: Licence

attributes.documentation: @dev Reverts if called by any address other than the DAO contract.
attributes.name: onlyDAO

attributes.documentation: @dev Ether can be deposited from any source, so this contract should be payable by anyone.
@return the scaled licence amount, used to calculate the split when loading.
attributes.name: licenceAmountScaled

attributes.documentation: @return the address of the multi-sig cryptocurrency float contract.
attributes.name: cryptoFloat

attributes.documentation: @return the address of the token holder contract.
attributes.name: tokenHolder

attributes.documentation: @return the address of the DAO contract.
attributes.name: DAO

attributes.documentation: @dev Updates the address of the DAO contract.
attributes.name: updateDAO

attributes.documentation: @dev Updates the address of the cyptoFloat.
attributes.name: updateFloat

attributes.documentation: @dev Updates the address of the Holder contract.
attributes.name: updateHolder

attributes.documentation: @dev Updates the card licence fee.
attributes.name: updateFee
load
